languages.text: {n}Соломон обводит взглядом собравшихся, взирающих на вас с изумлением и трепетом.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, значит... Ваше появление тут сродни историческому событию. Вот увидите, местные будут следить за каждым вашим шагом: может хватить одного вашего слова или нечаянного жеста, чтобы навсегда перевернуть жизнь этого отсталого мира".

{n}Solomorne looks at the throng currently staring at you in wonder and trepidation.{/n} "So, 'Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'... Your coming is a historic event for these people. Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every move, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон обводит взглядом собравшихся, взирающих на вас с изумлением и трепетом.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, значит... Ваше появление тут сродни историческому событию. Вот увидите, местные будут следить за каждым вашим шагом: может хватить одного вашего слова или нечаянного жеста, чтобы навсегда перевернуть жизнь этого отсталого мира".

Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every step, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."

Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every step, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙看着人群。所有人此时都直直地盯着你，目光中充满了惊讶、恐惧。{/n}“也就是说，‘来自上界的大人’……你的到来对这些人而言是件大事，完全足以记入史册。相信我，这些当地人会仔细观察你的一举一动。你说出的每句话，甚至不经意间的手势，都会改变他们在这个落后世界的人生。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the throng currently staring at you in wonder and trepidation.{/n} "So, 'Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'... Your coming is a historic event for these people. Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every move, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙看着人群。所有人此时都直直地盯着你，目光中充满了惊讶、恐惧。{/n}“也就是说，‘来自上界的大人’……你的到来对这些人而言是件大事，完全足以记入史册。相信我，这些当地人会仔细观察你的一举一动。你说出的每句话，甚至不经意间的手势，都会改变他们在这个落后世界的人生。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、驚きと不安の入り混じった眼差しであなたを見つめている群衆を見た。{/n}「さあ、『天の{mf|君|姫}』…あなたの到来は、これらの人々にとっては歴史的な出来事です。彼らはあなたの一挙手一投足を見つめています。あなたの行動はこの未開の世界に生きる彼らの人生を変えることになるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the crowd staring at you in wonder and trepidation.{/n} "So, 'Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'... Your coming is a historic event for these people. They will be watching your every step, and your actions may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、驚きと不安の入り混じった眼差しであなたを見つめている群衆を見た。{/n}「さあ、『天の{mf|君|姫}』…あなたの到来は、これらの人々にとっては歴史的な出来事です。彼らはあなたの一挙手一投足を見つめています。あなたの行動はこの未開の世界に生きる彼らの人生を変えることになるかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne escudriña el gentío que te observa maravillado y expectante.{/n} «Bien, “{mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial”... Su llegada constituye un hito histórico para estas personas. Se lo puedo asegurar: no le quitarán el ojo de encima a cada paso que dé, y cualquier gesto o palabra, por descuidado que sea, podría cambiar sus vidas en este mundo subdesarrollado».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the throng currently staring at you in wonder and trepidation.{/n} "So, 'Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'... Your coming is a historic event for these people. Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every move, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne escudriña el gentío que te observa maravillado y expectante.{/n} «Bien, “{mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial”... Su llegada constituye un hito histórico para estas personas. Se lo puedo asegurar: no le quitarán el ojo de encima a cada paso que dé, y cualquier gesto o palabra, por descuidado que sea, podría cambiar sus vidas en este mundo subdesarrollado».

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen, sana merakla ve endişeyle bakan kalabalığı izliyor.{/n} "'Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} demek... Gelişiniz, bu insanlar için tarihî bir olay. Aklınızda bulunsun... Yerel halk, her adımınızı izleyecek. Ağzınızdan çıkacak en ufak söz veya dikkatsizce yapılmış tek bir hareket ile bu az gelişmiş dünyadaki yaşamlarını değiştirebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the throng currently staring at you in wonder and trepidation.{/n} "So, 'Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'... Your coming is a historic event for these people. Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every move, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Üsteğmen, sana merakla ve endişeyle bakan kalabalığı izliyor.{/n} "'Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} demek... Gelişiniz, bu insanlar için tarihî bir olay. Aklınızda bulunsun... Yerel halk, her adımınızı izleyecek. Ağzınızdan çıkacak en ufak söz veya dikkatsizce yapılmış tek bir hareket ile bu az gelişmiş dünyadaki yaşamlarını değiştirebilirsiniz."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne observe la foule qui vous regarde avec étonnement et appréhension.{/n} « Eh bien, Votre Céleste Seigneurie... Votre venue est un événement historique pour ces gens. Ne vous y trompez pas : ces gens surveilleront le moindre de vos faits et gestes, et ce que vous ferez pourrait bien changer à jamais leur vie sur ce monde sous-développé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the throng currently staring at you in wonder and trepidation.{/n} "So, 'Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'... Your coming is a historic event for these people. Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every move, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne observe la foule qui vous regarde avec étonnement et appréhension.{/n} « Eh bien, Votre Céleste Seigneurie... Votre venue est un événement historique pour ces gens. Ne vous y trompez pas : ces gens surveilleront le moindre de vos faits et gestes, et ce que vous ferez pourrait bien changer à jamais leur vie sur ce monde sous-développé. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne betrachtet die Menge, die dich bewundernd und ängstlich anstarrt.{/n} "Also, '{mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}'. Euer Erscheinen ist für diese Leute ein historisches Ereignis. Ich versichere Euch, Sie werden jede Eurer Bewegungen verfolgen, da jedes Wort und jede sorglose Geste ihr Leben auf dieser unterentwickelten Welt verändern könnte."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at the throng currently staring at you in wonder and trepidation.{/n} "So, 'Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}'... Your coming is a historic event for these people. Rest assured: the locals will be watching your every move, and a single word or careless gesture from you may well transform their lives on this underdeveloped world."
